data.title: Sites using ADABAS in the U.S.
data.text:
LAST UPDATED: 3/6/00 5:45 pm

I am compiling a list of sites in the U.S. which have ADABAS installed. This is to aid us and other data processing professionals in finding positions along with being forwarned of what we could be dealing with.

The table list below is sorted by STATE.

If you would like to contribute, you will be kept anonymous and your info is subject to editing please email the info listed below in the same format for each site you know of using ADABAS. Thank You.....George Lewycky

Discussion email list

By subscribing to this LIST you can share and communicate with other people about ADABAS, by simply emailing to adabas@listbot.com

NOTE: you must be subscribed to use it

Join our mailing list! Enter your email address below, then click the 'Join List' button: Powered by ListBot

Â© Copyright 1996- George R. Lewycky

Submitting Information

IF you would like to contribute please COPY, PASTE & EMAIL me the following info in the format below (ascii text only). Do this for each site with ADABAS you know of or worked at. Please enter your info BELOW the headers:

ex. Company: XYZ Co. state: city: company: type of industry: environment (Natural, Supernatural, ADASQL, Adamints, etc): type of applications: rating of application(s)/environment (ease of use, stability, etc) [ 1 (lowest)- 10 [highest] : rating of company/management [ 1 (lowest)- 10 [highest]: other useful information: then email this to: lewycky@idt.net

Sites are listed below alphabetically by STATE

Abbreviations used above

ADA = adabas NAT = natural SQL = ADASQL M/F = mainframe www = world wide web c/s = client server

Software AG has their own consulting. Earlier this year they posted an add in a local NJ newspaper for work at their Ft. Lee location with the following: ADABAS, NATURAL, PREDICT & CONSTRUCT. Along with Client/Server computing & products such as: VB, PB, Oracle, Sybase or IBI. send resume to: Software AG, ATTN: FL, 11190 Sunrise Valley Dr., Reston, VA 22091 FAX: 703 391 8340

EMAIL: sasal@sagus.com OR see their WWW site below.

Looking for some good ADABAS manuals ???

WH&O International of Wellesley, MA has some very good manuals. "Inside ADABAS", $50 (I think) is great for newcomers and they have a wide range of manuals on NATURAL and other areas of ADABAS.

who@tiac.net WH&O International P O Box 812785 Wellesley, MA 02181-0025 Telephone 1 800 553-6678 Local 617 239-0822 Fax 617 239-0827 List of Publications NATURAL Publications NATURAL Study Guide NATURAL Developers Handbook Advanced NATURAL Study Guide NATURAL for DB2 Publications NATURAL for DB2 Study Guide NATURAL for DB2 Developers Handbook Other NATURAL Publications NATURAL 2.2 Enhancements for Programmers Developing NATURAL Systems NATURAL Tips & Techniques NATURAL for VMS Publications NATURAL for VMS Study Guide NATURAL for VMS Developers Handbook ADABAS Publications Inside ADABAS ADABAS 5 Performance Guide PREDICT Publications Introduction to PREDICT PREDICT and Applications Development Guide NATURAL CONSTRUCT Publications NATURAL CONSTRUCT Study Guide NATURAL CONSTRUCT Users' Guide NATURAL CONSTRUCT Tips & Techniques
